content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's make this transaction as profitable as possible for me. How much are you willing to pay for my precious apartment? Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will take advantage of you if I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your approach goes against my ethical standards as a responsible individual. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
